title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Sara A. Hotchkiss, June 24, 1863
summary: Hotchkiss describes the Confederate Army's movement northwards to Sharpsburg, then to Pennsylvania. He writes of the supplies the army is acquiring there, and describes the people of Pennsylvania. He also gives brief instructions to his wife concerning affairs at home.
keywords: Trrop Movement, Home Front, Agriculture, American Civil War
